title: Welcome to OmniFeed: Your New Content Hub
description: This is your first post! It demonstrates how articles are structured and displayed on the site. You can edit this or delete it and start creating your own content.
content:
Welcome to the Future of Content

This is a sample post created for you by Studio. The platform is now fully configured and ready for your content. You can manage all your posts by editing the src/lib/articles.json file.

Key Features

Here’s a quick rundown of what we’ve built:

  • Static Site Generation: Your site is built with Next.js and exported to static HTML, making it incredibly fast and SEO-friendly.
  • Dynamic Pages: Article and category pages are generated automatically at build time.
  • Clean Design: A modern, responsive design using Tailwind CSS and ShadCN UI components.

We are excited to see what you create!
author: Studio

title: Hiring: Total Station Surveyor
description: We are looking for a skilled Total Station Surveyor with at least 3 years of experience to join our team. If you have strong technical skills in survey equipment setup, data collection, and quality control, we want to hear from you.
content:
Join Our Team as a Total Station Surveyor

We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Total Station Surveyor to support our land surveying operations. This role is essential in ensuring precise field measurements and accurate data handling for construction and mapping projects.

Job Responsibilities

1. Setting Up the Equipment

  • Positioning: Set up the Total Station accurately at known points, ensuring level and calibration.
  • Orientation: Properly orient the instrument using known reference points.
  • Calibration Checks: Regularly verify the instrument’s calibration to maintain measurement accuracy.

2. Data Collection

  • Measurements: Record horizontal/vertical angles and distances to survey points.
  • Control Points: Identify and measure control benchmarks and key reference points.
  • Field Notes: Maintain detailed notes, including conditions, instrument settings, and issues encountered.

3. Data Management

  • Recording: Log data into the Total Station system and ensure backups are created.
  • Error Checking: Monitor readings for discrepancies, anomalies, or poor conditions.
  • Data Transfer: Download collected data for analysis and mapping.

4. Analysis and Quality Control

  • Processing: Use software tools to process survey data into maps, 3D models, or plans.
  • Accuracy Verification: Ensure final data meets required standards and re-check if needed.

Job Details

  • Pay: ₹25,000.00 - ₹35,000.00 per month
  • Schedule: Day shift / Morning shift
  • Supplemental Pay: Performance bonus
  • Experience: Minimum 3 years (preferred)
  • Work Location: In person

If you're passionate about precision and ready to contribute to impactful surveying projects, apply now!
author: HR Team
